thread.title: 'Game of Thrones’ producer launches new fantasy series
thread.title_full: 'Game of Thrones’ producer launches new fantasy series

author: PTI
title: 'Game of Thrones’ producer launches new fantasy series
text:
PTI | October 05, 2015, 13.20 pm Los Angeles: Frank Doelger, one of the producers of the famous‘Game of Thrones’, has joined up with ‘Rome’ producer Jonathan Stamp on an ambitious new fantasy series set in a fictional, tribal world.
‘The Perished Land’, which Doelger and Stamp will co-write, is set on the fictional world of Talanton. It is described as a primitive, tribal world where human and supernatural forces interact, The Hollywood Reporter said. Rainmark Films will produce with Germany's Hofman & Voges and Beta Film. Beta will handle international sales.
